actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment (without written report).

official_title: A bill entitled the "Federal Election Commission Authorization".

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment (without written report)) Authorizes appropriations for the Federal Election Commission for fiscal year 1980, to distribute funds to State offices for their costs in receiving, indexing, and maintaining reports required of election candidates under the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971. Requires the Commission to devise a formula for distributing such sums to the State offices according to the number of electoral votes each State cast in the previous presidential election.

titles.title: A bill entitled the "Federal Election Commission Authorization".
